item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Facebook Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly experienced video editor to edit Facebook ads for health products.
We are a e-commerce brand, breaking into the US. As we pioneer this venture, we are on the lookout for a seasoned video editor.

The videos are VSLs (Video Sales Letters) and are quite long, so attention to detail is crucial. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in editing high-converting Facebook ads. This is a fast-paced environment that requires quick turnarounds and the ability to deliver high-quality edited videos. The selected candidate will be responsible for ensuring that the videos are visually appealing, engaging, and aligned with the brand's messaging.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing (preferably long VSLs,)
- In-depth knowledge advertising.
- hard working and responsible
- Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal.

Advantages:
- The opportunity to be a pivotal part of our growing company from its early stages.
- Room for career advancement, with the potential to become the Head of content production or a crwative director.

If you are passionate about creating world class, movie-like videos , possess a wealth of experience in the field, and are ready to contribute to the success of a burgeoning e-commerce brand, we invite you to apply. Join us on this exciting journey.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 12:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Mobile App Store Marketing Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a simple marketing video for our app on the Apple and Play mobile app stores.

The video should effectively showcase the features and benefits of our app in a concise and attention-grabbing manner. The video should be visually appealing, with captivating animations and engaging graphics.

We will provide the necessary content, such as screenshots, text and app logo.

The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, motion graphics, and knowledge of mobile app marketing. Attention to detail and creativity are essential skills for this project.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 16, 2024 12:08 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Graphic Design, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Android
Skills: Graphic Design, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Android
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Money making Reel style editor in Italian content - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a video editor who can edit daily 2 videos: one "spoken" style and one "text only" style.
Videos are in ITALIAN, so you should be able to edit italian content without missing a word.

REEL ("Spoken" style)
99% of videos are translations of english versions like:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6exbjKvQYt/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6pF0yOMXEx/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C3tUsaEsw9B/
So you can copy the exact style. And make it PROFESSIONAL.

You will be provided with an easy guide to follow, with all the images you'll need and raw videos to cut.
They will each become 20-40sec long.
You have to add simple animations, SFX, italian captions, simple motion graphics...  exactly like linked videos.

TIKTOK/SHORT ("Text only" style)
All videos must be translated from videos like:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C4WADX3CL6k/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5vdJmciqzF/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C3ib6l5N3C9/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6PXHeuAk7F/
You can copy the exact style and just translate it in italian.

Background "lifestyle" videos will be provided to you, giving you access to a Google Drive folder. You'll only need to add texts.

It's better to edit these videos in bulk as they are super fast to produce (easy 15 videos/hour)

!! IMPORTANT !!
DON'T APPLY FOR THIS JOB if you:
- can't edit like linked videos
- can't correctly edit italian content and captions
- can't use simple transitions, SFX, simple animations
- can't keep up with the scheduling dates
- don't pay attention to details

Before paying you, to see if you are truly capable, you will be asked to do a test:
edit 1 quick "spoken" style video of 21 seconds.
so if you are not able to provide what I need, we'll immediately find out.

But if you can edit like these videos, please reply at this job post sharing me some of your past or active clients' projects with similar needs.

Payments are weekly recurring for the first 3/4 weeks, then they will become monthly.
Budget is around 250$/month, we need to confront each other first, and agree on a payment based on performance

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 16, 2024 12:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Video Editing
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Short Fashion/Styling Video Content - Upwork
item.description:
We need short fashion / styling video content in bulk (10 to 20 short [instagram] and 5 to 10 medium [youtube]) . These would be about styling tips for various female garments. These can be shot on phone or any other video camera (as long as they are full HD 1080p) . Some of these videos need to be short form (instagram aspect ratio) (about 20 secs to 40 secs approx) [These could get posted to various social media including but not limited to Instagram, Youtube Shorts, TikTok, Threads etc].  example - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IWDMs8ja_aE .   And some of these need to be medium length (about 2 mins to 10 mins approx) (youtube aspect ratio) . example - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xkW9TQI2P8M. There is no requirement to buy additional garments. Any existing garments which the artist possesses are fine. For some videos background music with text captions is fine. For most  videos though the artist needs to speak English language fluently (accent) and describe the garment/accessory styling.  Upload video on our google drive and also sign artist release form allowing us to use/post/own the content.  Our logo/branding also needs to appear or spoken about in the videos (i.e. XYZ magazine or X Media) . Prefer artists resident in Australia (but thats not mandatory).  While posting each of these videos we also want the artist to accept collab post (instagram and other platforms whereever applicable)  and thus play an influencer role.

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 16, 2024 11:46 UTC
Category: Fashion Design
Skills:Footwear, Accessories, Clothing, Female, Fashion Illustration, Fashion Editorial, Fashion & Apparel, Personal Styling, Wardrobe Styling
Skills: Footwear, Accessories, Clothing, Female, Fashion Illustration, Fashion Editorial, Fashion & Apparel, Personal Styling, Wardrobe Styling
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor DTC E-Commerce Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor for our fast growing sustainable cleaning brand that is disrupting the industry!

This is a full time position for 32-40 hours a week where we pay a monthly fixed fee.

Responsibilities
- Create and edit video ad creatives for our products
- Track progress in our project management software (ClickUp)
- Meet all deliverable deadlines
- Attend weekly online meetings
- Report directly to supervisor

Deliverables
- Daily editing of new video ad creative concept
- Edit new hooks on winning video creatives
- Make revisions on video ad creatives within 24 hours after receiving feedback

Requirements
- At least 1-2 years of experience editing videos for DTC E-commerce brands
- Know how to edit in an engaging way that get people interested in buying a product
- Proven skills by including portfolio of previous work with ads you created for DTC brands
- Be pro-active in your work and take initiative in deliverables
- Work together in a team in a fast growing company
- Speak English fluently

Technology requirements
- Premium editing software (Premier Pro, Final Cut, Davinci, etc.)
- Fast Mac or PC (Good Graphics Card & min 16GB RAM)
- Good internet connection (Uploading & downloading video footage)
- Google Drive & ClickUp

Please include your portfolio with previous work of video ad creatives for DTC brands in your job application.

IMPORTANT: start your application with EARTH in the subject to be considered


Posted On: June 16, 2024 11:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Ad, Facebook Advertising
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Ad, Facebook Advertising
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
